Title: China’s Wison announces exit from Russian energy projects in fresh blow to Arctic LNG
Description: China-based LNG solutions company Wison New Energies has announced its exit from all Russian energy projects, which is seen as a fresh blow to Russia’s 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG project, which Wison is involved in.
Author: JS

Title: Restart activities underway at Wheatstone gas platform; LNG ship docks at terminal
Description: Restart activities are underway at the Chevron-operated offshore Wheatstone platform following a June 11 shutdown of its fuel gas system. This shutdown suspended gas flows to two LNG trains and a domestic gas plant, tightening LNG supplies and helping to underpin the recent strength in spot LNG prices.
Author: CK

Title: EU agrees on a fourteenth sanctions package against Russia, targeting LNG for the first time
Description: The European Union has agreed on a new sanctions package against Russia in response to its aggression against Ukraine, targeting its LNG exports for the first time.
Author: CK
